name: Mittens Throws Down
description:
STORY: You play as Mittens DonGino, fourth son of the great DonGino mob family.  After finding out that the first son (Claws) has been working with the Feds to lock up the second son (Paws DonGino) and the third son (Socks DonGino). you need to restore the family’s honor and put a smile back on Big Daddy Tom’s face. So, it’s up to you to off him.

But there’s a catch, The only way that you can off somebody is with the mittens that good ol’ Mama gave you; It’s a family rule: “You gotta use what your mama gave you''. These mittens might not be so good for punching, but with them you can grab onto almost anything. So, beat them up, grab them, hop to the top of a tall building, drop them and wait for that beautiful sound. SPLAT! Execution style.
